resources.string: Q1. What is Parkinson app doing?
A1. This app takes the filtered value from adxl345 sensor attached with glove using HC-05 bluetooth module.
Q2. What is the purpose of this app?
A2.User with this app can check their intensity of tremors that happen in their hand through graph and can also save his maximum amplitude of tremors on that day.
A3. The primary objective of the Tremor Detection Glove with Haptic Feedback Motors and Android Application project is to develop a comprehensive solution for tremor detection, analysis, and support.
Q4. How are you guys different?

A4. We try to give some Embedded solution for tremors causing disease because in the traditional method we have to go to the hospital and consult to the specific doctor to analyse tremors and detect possible cause of it.But with our app user can check their tremor intensity and also save for future reference so that it will also help doctors to diagnose the cause easily.
